chart_description: This chart displays the total CPU utilization percentage of the system. It includes the utilization of all CPU cores.

dimension_descriptions.iowait: The percentage of CPU time spent waiting for I/O operations to complete.
dimension_descriptions.nice: The percentage of CPU time spent running user space processes with a positive nice value.
dimension_descriptions.softirq: The percentage of CPU time spent handling soft interrupts.
dimension_descriptions.steal: The percentage of CPU time spent waiting for a CPU resource to become available in a virtualized environment.
dimension_descriptions.system: The percentage of CPU time spent running kernel space processes.
dimension_descriptions.user: The percentage of CPU time spent running user space processes.
